4.title: Episode #1.4

episode of.title: The Golden Age of Wild Chicago (TV Series 2013– )

4.plot: It's "Wild Chicago," the crazy-funny hit TV show from WTTW, taking its rabid viewers to the kookiest corners of the city. Behold...From the "All Joe Show" Special:Jo-Jo's BarJoe's SausageJoe Kosala's Police StationandThe Rock Star Shop People Who Live Under The SkywayBell Ringers at U of CLeaning Tower YMCA in NilesStunt School"Wild Chicago" is Reality TV at its unpretentious best.

5.title: Episode #1.5

episode of.title: The Golden Age of Wild Chicago (TV Series 2013– )

5.plot: This is "Wild Chicago" -- the crazy-funny hit TV show on WTTW-Channel 11 that bought its viewers to the kookiest corners of the city.In this episode:Rat Lady Samantha MartinSnackville JunctionFisherman's Dude RanchMontenegro's PuppetsTattoo Factory Original "Wild Chicago" pitch tape (1987) Stephen Colbert in Lincoln ParkRichard M. Daley at City HallReality TV at its unpretentious best.
